summary: *DO NOT REPOST, JUST REBLOGS* Current/latest self portrait sketch with my new haircut. Finally got my hair “tamed” with a proper...
caption:
*DO NOT REPOST, JUST REBLOGS*

Current/latest self portrait sketch with my new haircut. Finally got my hair “tamed” with a proper cut, something different. Got hime bangs, so I got a 2-in-1 deal: I can have days where I have short hair and others well, long with short bangs haha xD

Look, it’s Ramel! My brother’s Metroid inspired crystal alien space fighter! Go check out my instagram, this piece has come along a lot accross WIP Wednesdays~

twitter | instagram | facebook | deviantart

Hey! Likes boost my ego, but reblogs boost my ability to reach more people with my art! So if you like me, I appreciate it, but if you reblog, you’re actually helping!

summary: Image Description: Artwork of a purple and blue galaxy with stars and blue triangles. The galaxy fades into the background while...
caption:
Image Description: Artwork of a purple and blue galaxy with stars and blue triangles. The galaxy fades into the background while the triangles stand out at the center of the piece. This work was originally created on canvas with oil paints and is signed by the artist, ‘A.M.’ at the bottom right corner.
End ID.

reblog.comment:
Image Description: Artwork of a purple and blue galaxy with stars and blue triangles. The galaxy fades into the background while the triangles stand out at the center of the piece. This work was originally created on canvas with oil paints and is signed by the artist, ‘A.M.’ at the bottom right corner.

body:
I’m going to be honest.


I adore artists in the Voltron Fandom. And of course for my personal ship. The artist in the fandom are so talented and very hardworking. No matter what style. Even though we all have that preferred style we like to look at.

So I don’t care if you guys see my asks that I send to artist, I just showing them how much I love them. (I know some of you have seen my asks because I always check the notes of my asks and I know almost all my followers.) I legit send messages to the artists who don’t have an open ask box just to say “I love your art, you’re very talented.” Etc. You guys should just look at my messaging box.

reblog.comment:

summary: Even if it is small, every little thing we do matters. I know, it is a cliche done to death. However, I enjoy thinking this way,...
caption: Even if it is small, every little thing we do matters. I know, it is a cliche done to death. However, I enjoy thinking this way, especially when, with patience, I come across the results of an action I considered insignificant, only to be proven completely wrong.

reblog.comment: Even if it is small, every little thing we do matters. I know, it is a cliche done to death. However, I enjoy thinking this way, especially when, with patience, I come across the results of an action I considered insignificant, only to be proven completely wrong.

trail.content_raw: Even if it is small, every little thing we do matters. I know, it is a cliche done to death. However, I enjoy thinking this way, especially when, with patience, I come across the results of an action I considered insignificant, only to be proven completely wrong.
trail.content: Even if it is small, every little thing we do matters. I know, it is a cliche done to death. However, I enjoy thinking this way, especially when, with patience, I come across the results of an action I considered insignificant, only to be proven completely wrong.
